attributes.additional_details:
Since e-petitions were introduced, they have been mostly used be minority interests to project the image of being more popular than they actually are and getting onto the political agenda. This is not what government should be listening to.

Further, if Members of Parliament were doing their jobs and speaking to their constituents regularly, they would get a much better picture of what the public cares about.

Therefore, we petition the government to abolish e-petitions and get MPs back out on the doorstep.
